item: Mars video and hot springs Virtual Field Trip
description: Part A: Watch Mars research video and write short report. Part B: Virtual Field Trip analyzing hot spring environments and protocell emergence theories. Includes critical analysis of life origins.

item: Searching for life on Mars and beyond
description: 2000-word report evaluating evidence of past microbial life in Jezero Crater using course content, virtual fieldwork, and NASA Q&A session. Analyzes implications for extraterrestrial life.
Part A: Individual handwritten field notebook analyzing Pilbara fossil sites. Part B: Group video reconstruction of Pilbara's 3.48-billion-year life story using shared notebooks.
